remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當沒有任何泛型類型定義 」 或 「 開放式建構的類型所有封入類型或方法本身的類型引數中，可以叫用泛型方法。A generic method can be invoked only if there are no generic type definitions or open constructed types in the type arguments of the method itself or in any enclosing types. 型別可以很複雜，因為並不容易進行這種遞迴判定。Because types can be arbitrarily complex, making this recursive determination is difficult. 為了方便起見，並減少錯誤的機會屬性提供的標準方式來區別封閉式的建構方法，可以叫用，並開啟建構無法的方法。For convenience, and to reduce the chance of error, the property provides a standard way to distinguish between closed constructed methods, which can be invoked, and open constructed methods, which cannot. 如果屬性會傳回`true`，無法叫用此方法。If the property returns `true`, the method cannot be invoked. 以遞迴方式型別參數的屬性搜尋。The property searches recursively for type parameters. 例如，它會傳回`true`開啟型別中的任何方法`A`(`A(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中)，即使不是泛型方法本身。For example, it returns `true` for any method in an open type `A` (`A(Of T)` in Visual Basic), even though the method itself is not generic. 這和行為的屬性，它會傳回`false`這類方法。Contrast this with the behavior of the property, which returns `false` for such a method. 同樣地， property 參數會傳回`true`開啟型別中任何建構函式，即使建構函式不能有自己的型別參數。Similarly, the property parameter returns `true` for any constructor in an open type, even though constructors cannot have type parameters of their own. 非變異條件的詞彙與泛型方法的特定清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 如需其他用在反映中泛型的詞彙的非變異條件的清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前執行的方法上泛型類型，定義所傳回取自泛型類型定義 (也就是傳回`true`)。If the currently executing method is defined on a generic type, the that is returned by is obtained from the generic type definition (that is, returns `true`). 因此，它並不會反映時呼叫該方法所使用的型別引數。Therefore, it does not reflect the type arguments that were used when the method was called. 比方說，如果方法`M()`泛型類型上定義`C`(`C(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中)，和從呼叫`C.M()`，然後傳回`C.M()`(`C(Of T).M()`在 Visual Basic 中)。For example, if a method `M()` is defined on a generic type `C` (`C(Of T)` in Visual Basic), and is called from `C.M()`, then returns `C.M()` (`C(Of T).M()` in Visual Basic). 如果目前執行的方法是泛型的方法，傳回泛型方法定義。If the currently executing method is a generic method, returns the generic method definition. 如果泛型的方法上泛型類型，定義取自泛型類型定義。If the generic method is defined on a generic type, the is obtained from the generic type definition. ## Examples 下列範例會定義兩種類型。The following example defines two types. 第一個是非泛型類別， `TestClass`，包括建構函式，名為的方法`GetValue`，和名為讀寫屬性`GetValue`。The first is a non-generic class, `TestClass`, includes a constructor, a method named `GetValue`, and a read-write property named `GetValue`. 第二個是泛型類別，名為`TestClass`包含建構函式，`GetValue`方法，而且泛型的方法， `ConvertValue`。The second is a generic class named `TestClass` that includes a constructor, a `GetValue` method, and a generic method, `ConvertValue`. 每個建構函式、 方法和屬性存取子包含呼叫方法。Each constructor, method, and property accessor includes a call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod/cs/GetCurentMethod1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod/vb/GetCurentMethod1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回陣列中的項目會以其出現在清單中的泛型方法的型別參數的順序。The elements of the returned array are in the order in which they appear in the list of type parameters for the generic method. - 如果目前的方法為封閉式的建構的方法 (也就是屬性會傳回`false`)，所傳回的陣列方法包含已指派給之泛型方法的泛型類型參數的型別定義。If the current method is a closed constructed method (that is, the property returns `false`), the array returned by the method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic method definition. - 如果目前的方法是泛型方法定義，陣列會包含型別參數。If the current method is a generic method definition, the array contains the type parameters. - 如果目前的方法是開啟的建構的方法 (也就是屬性會傳回`true`) 中的特定類型已指派給某些型別參數和型別封入泛型類型參數已指派給其他類型參數，此陣列包含型別和型別參數。If the current method is an open constructed method (that is, the property returns `true`) in which specific types have been assigned to some type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types have been assigned to other type parameters, the array contains both types and type parameters. 使用屬性來區分它們。Use the property to tell them apart. 如需示範此案例中，請參閱提供的程式碼範例屬性。For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example provided for the property. .NET Framework 2.0 版中不支援泛型建構函式。Generic constructors are not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 這個屬性會擲回如果未在衍生類別中覆寫，因此例外狀況會擲回目前的執行個體屬於類型。This property throws if not overridden in a derived class, so an exception is thrown if the current instance is of type . 非變異條件的詞彙與泛型方法的特定清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 如需其他用在反映中泛型的詞彙的非變異條件的清單，請參閱屬性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

Visual Basic 範例會顯示篩選子句中，使用 Visual Basic`When`運算式，其他語言的範例中會省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是便利的方法呼叫方法多載，傳遞如`invokeAttr`和`null`如`binder`和`culture`。This is a convenience method that calls the method overload, passing for `invokeAttr` and `null` for `binder` and `culture`. 如果叫用的方法擲回例外狀況，方法傳回的例外狀況。If the invoked method throws an exception, the method returns the exception. 要叫用靜態方法，使用其物件，傳遞`null`如`obj`。To invoke a static method using its object, pass `null` for `obj`. > [!NOTE] > 如果這個方法多載用來叫用的執行個體建構函式，該物件提供給`obj`重新初始化; 也就是執行所有執行個體的初始設定式。If this method overload is used to invoke an instance constructor, the object supplied for `obj` is reinitialized; that is, all instance initializers are executed. 傳回值為 `null`。The return value is `null`. 如果類別建構函式會叫用，則會重新初始化類別;也就是說，所有的類別初始設定式會執行。If a class constructor is invoked, the class is reinitialized; that is, all class initializers are executed. 傳回值為 `null`。The return value is `null`. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫端被授與與旗標，如果非公用成員的授權集僅限於呼叫者的授與集或子集合類別。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. 如果目前方法的參數是實值類型，且對應的引數中`parameters`是`null`，執行階段會傳遞實值類型的零初始化執行個體。If a parameter of the current method is a value type, and the corresponding argument in `parameters` is `null`, the runtime passes a zero-initialized instance of the value type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用反映來動態方法查閱。The following code example demonstrates dynamic method lookup using reflection. 請注意，您不能使用叫用在衍生類別中覆寫的方法，因為晚期繫結無法解析的覆寫基底類別的物件。Note that you cannot use the object from the base class to invoke the overridden method in the derived class, because late binding cannot resolve overrides. remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態叫用這個執行個體所反映的方法`obj`，並且傳遞指定的參數。Dynamically invokes the method reflected by this instance on `obj`, and passes along the specified parameters. 如果這個方法是靜態，`obj`參數已忽略。If the method is static, the `obj` parameter is ignored. 對於非靜態方法，`obj`應該類別繼承，或是宣告方法，必須是相同的類型與這個類別的執行個體。For non-static methods, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the method and must be the same type as this class. 如果方法沒有參數，值`parameters`應該`null`。If the method has no parameters, the value of `parameters` should be `null`. 否則數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`應該數目、 類型與這個執行個體所反映的方法參數順序相同。Otherwise, the number, type, and order of elements in `parameters` should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the method reflected by this instance. 您不可以省略選擇性參數呼叫`Invoke`。You may not omit optional parameters in calls to `Invoke`. 若要叫用方法，並省略選擇性參數，您應該呼叫`Type.InvokeMember`改為。To invoke a method omitting optional parameters, you should call `Type.InvokeMember` instead. > [!NOTE] > 如果這個方法多載用來叫用的執行個體建構函式，該物件提供給`obj`重新初始化; 也就是執行所有執行個體的初始設定式。If this method overload is used to invoke an instance constructor, the object supplied for `obj` is reinitialized; that is, all instance initializers are executed. 傳回值為 `null`。The return value is `null`. 如果類別建構函式會叫用，則會重新初始化類別;也就是說，所有的類別初始設定式會執行。If a class constructor is invoked, the class is reinitialized; that is, all class initializers are executed. 傳回值為 `null`。The return value is `null`. 傳值方式傳遞基本參數，執行一般擴展 (Int16]-> [Int32，例如)。For pass-by-value primitive parameters, normal widening is performed (Int16 -> Int32, for example). 傳值方式傳遞參考參數，一般參考擴展允許 （至基底類別和介面類型的基底類別衍生的類別）。For pass-by-value reference parameters, normal reference widening is allowed (derived class to base class, and base class to interface type). 不過，若為傳址方式傳遞基本參數，類型必須完全符合。However, for pass-by-reference primitive parameters, the types must match exactly. 傳址方式傳遞參考參數的一般擴展仍然適用。For pass-by-reference reference parameters, the normal widening still applies. 例如，如果該方法所反映這個執行個體宣告為`public boolean Compare(String a, String b)`，然後`parameters`應該是陣列的`Objects`長度為 2， `parameters[0] = new Object("SomeString1") and parameters[1] = new Object("SomeString2")`。For example, if the method reflected by this instance is declared as `public boolean Compare(String a, String b)`, then `parameters` should be an array of `Objects` with length 2 such that `parameters[0] = new Object("SomeString1") and parameters[1] = new Object("SomeString2")`. 如果目前方法的參數是實值類型，且對應的引數中`parameters`是`null`，執行階段會傳遞實值類型的零初始化執行個體。If a parameter of the current method is a value type, and the corresponding argument in `parameters` is `null`, the runtime passes a zero-initialized instance of the value type. 反映叫用虛擬方法時，會使用動態方法查閱。Reflection uses dynamic method lookup when invoking virtual methods. 例如，假設類別 B 繼承自類別 A，而且兩者實作虛擬方法，名為 M。現在，假設您有`MethodInfo`物件，代表 M 上類別 a。如果您使用`Invoke`M 類型 B 的物件上叫用，則反映將使用指定的類別 b 的實作方法即使 B 類型的物件會轉換成 A，要使用類別 B 所指定的實作 （請參閱以下程式碼範例）。For example, suppose that class B inherits from class A and both implement a virtual method named M. Now suppose that you have a `MethodInfo` object that represents M on class A. If you use the `Invoke` method to invoke M on an object of type B, then reflection will use the implementation given by class B. Even if the object of type B is cast to A, the implementation given by class B is used (see code sample below). 相反地，如果非虛擬方法，則反映會採用的實作類型，指定要從中`MethodInfo`已取得，不論類型為何傳遞做為目標的物件。On the other hand, if the method is non-virtual, then reflection will use the implementation given by the type from which the `MethodInfo` was obtained, regardless of the type of the object passed as the target. 完全信任程式碼會忽略存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取和每當程式碼受到完全信任時，透過反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked via reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 如果叫用的方法擲回例外狀況，`TargetInvocationException.GetException`傳回例外狀況。If the invoked method throws an exception, `TargetInvocationException.GetException` returns the exception. 此實作會擲回`NotSupportedException`。This implementation throws a `NotSupportedException`. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫端被授與與旗標，如果非公用成員的授權集僅限於呼叫者的授與集或子集合類別。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例示範的所有成員類別使用的多載。The following example demonstrates all members of the class using an overload of . 私用方法`CanConvertFrom`尋找相容的類型指定型別。The private method `CanConvertFrom` finds compatible types for a given type. 叫用成員的自訂繫結案例中的另一個範例，請參閱[動態載入和使用型別](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamically-loading-and-using-types.md)。For another example of invoking members in a custom binding scenario, see [Dynamically Loading and Using Types](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamically-loading-and-using-types.md). [!code-cpp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CPP/binder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CS/binder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/VB/binder.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別上宣告抽象成員，因此不提供實作。An abstract member is declared on a base class and has no implementation supplied. 若要取得，第一次取得型別。To get the , first get the type. 從型別，get 方法。From the type, get the method. 從方法，取得`MethodBase`。From the method, get the `MethodBase`. 如果`MethodBase`或建構函式不是公用，則受到保護，並無法輕易地存取。If the `MethodBase` or constructor is other than public, it is protected and cannot be readily accessed. 若要存取非公用方法，設定遮罩至`NonPublic`中`GetMethod`。To access a non-public method, set the mask to `NonPublic` in `GetMethod`. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷是否將指定的方法是抽象的並顯示結果。The following example determines whether specified the method is abstract and displays the result. remarks.format: ## Remarks 其類型的可見性受限於實際的可見性的方法。The actual visibility of a method is limited by the visibility of its type. 屬性可能是`true`方法，但如果它是私用巢狀型別的方法的方法不包含型別外部可見的。The property might be `true` for a method, but if it is a method of a private nested type then the method is not visible outside the containing type. 完全所描述的方法或建構函式可見性只有可視性修飾詞是否`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)。The visibility of a method or constructor is exactly described by if the only visibility modifier is `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic). 這個屬性是`false`的方法`protected internal`C# 中 (`Protected Friend`在 Visual Basic 中`protected public`c + + 中); 使用屬性來識別這類方法。This property is `false` for methods that are `protected internal` in C# (`Protected Friend` in Visual Basic, `protected public` in C++); use the property to identify such methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義具有不同層級的可見性的方法，並顯示的值及其， ， ，和屬性。The following code example defines methods with varying levels of visibility, and displays the values of their , , , and properties. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 語言無法定義具有方法可見性，則為，存取層級只會出現在 c + + 範例。The Visual Basic and C# languages cannot define methods with visibility; that access level appears only in the C++ example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷是否可覆寫方法，不檢查是否足夠是`true`。To determine if a method is overridable, it is not sufficient to check that is `true`. 將可覆寫，方法如`IsVirtual`必須`true`和`IsFinal`必須`false`。For a method to be overridable, `IsVirtual` must be `true` and `IsFinal` must be `false`. 例如，方法可能會非虛擬的但它會實作介面方法。For example, a method might be non-virtual, but it implements an interface method. Common language runtime 需要實作介面成員的所有方法都必須都標示為`virtual`; 因此，編譯器會將方法標示`virtual final`。The common language runtime requires that all methods that implement interface members must be marked as `virtual`; therefore, the compiler marks the method `virtual final`. 讓某些情況下，其中的方法標示為`virtual`但仍不可覆寫。So there are cases where a method is marked as `virtual` but is still not overridable. 若要確定是否可覆寫方法，使用如下的程式碼：To establish with certainty whether a method is overridable, use code such as this: `if (MethodInfo.IsVirtual && !MethodInfo.IsFinal)` 如果`IsVirtual`是`false`或`IsFinal`是`true`，則無法覆寫此方法。If `IsVirtual` is `false` or `IsFinal` is `true`, then the method cannot be overridden. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示`false`如`IsFinal`，這可能會導致您認為 MyMethod 是可覆寫。The following example displays `false` for `IsFinal`, which might lead you to think that MyMethod is overridable. 程式碼會列印`false`即使未標記為 MyMethod`virtual`因此不能覆寫。The code prints `false` even though MyMethod is not marked `virtual` and thus cannot be overridden. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件代表泛型方法。Use the property to determine whether the current object represents a generic method. 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件都代表開放式建構的方法或封閉式的建構的方法。Use the property to determine whether the current object represents an open constructed method or a closed constructed method. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，不支援泛型這個屬性會傳回`false`如果未在衍生類別中覆寫。Generics are not supported by default; this property returns `false` if not overridden in a derived class. 泛型建構函式不支援在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，因此這個屬性會傳回`false`如果目前的執行個體屬於類型。Generic constructors are not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0, so this property returns `false` if the current instance is of type . 下表摘要說明非變異詞彙與泛型方法的特定條件。The following table summarizes the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods. 用來在反映中泛型，例如其他條款*泛型型別參數*和*泛型型別*，請參閱屬性。For other terms used in generic reflection, such as *generic type parameter* and *generic type*, see the property. |詞彙Term|非變異條件Invariant condition| |---|---| |泛型方法定義generic method definition| 屬性為 `true`。The property is `true`.
定義泛型方法。Defines a generic method. 建構的方法由呼叫方法物件，代表泛型方法定義，並指定型別引數的陣列。A constructed method is created by calling the method on a object that represents a generic method definition, and specifying an array of type arguments.
泛型方法定義上只可以呼叫方法。The method can be called only on generic method definitions.
任何泛型方法定義為泛型方法，但反之不然。Any generic method definition is a generic method, but the converse is not true.| |Generic Method - 泛型方法generic method|`IsGenericMethod` 屬性為 `true`。The `IsGenericMethod` property is `true`.
可以是泛型方法定義中，開啟建構的方法或封閉式的建構的方法。Can be a generic method definition, an open constructed method, or a closed constructed method.| |開放式建構的方法open constructed method| 屬性為 `true`。The property is `true`.
您不可能叫用開啟的建構的方法。It is not possible to invoke an open constructed method.| |封閉式的建構的方法closed constructed method| 屬性為 `false`。The property is `false`.
當遞迴檢查，此方法沒有任何未指派的泛型參數。When examined recursively, the method has no unassigned generic parameters. 包含型別沒有泛型型別參數，且型別引數都沒有泛型型別參數。The containing type has no generic type parameters, and none of the type arguments have generic type parameters.
可以叫用此方法。The method can be invoked.|

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether only a member of the same kind with exactly the same signature is hidden in the derived class.

value.span: 如果簽章，會隱藏成員，否則， 。

span.span: if the member is hidden by signature; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中的成員宣告與 C#`new`修飾詞或 Visual Basic`Shadows`修飾詞，它可以隱藏基底類別中相同名稱的成員。When a member in a derived class is declared with the C# `new` modifier or the Visual Basic `Shadows` modifier, it can hide a member of the same name in the base class. C# 簽章隱藏基底類別成員。C# hides base class members by signature. 也就是說，如果基底類別成員具有多個多載，隱藏只有一個是具有相同的簽章的一個。That is, if the base class member has multiple overloads, the only one that is hidden is the one that has the identical signature. 相反地，Visual Basic 會隱藏所有基底類別多載。By contrast, Visual Basic hides all the base class overloads. 因此，傳回`false`與 Visual Basic 中宣告的成員上`Shadows`修飾詞，以及`true`使用 C# 中宣告的成員上`new`修飾詞。Thus, returns `false` on a member declared with the Visual Basic `Shadows` modifier, and `true` on a member declared with the C# `new` modifier. > [!WARNING] > 這個屬性不會判斷方法是否屬性。This property does not determine whether a method has the attribute. 宣告其中一種方法`new`或`Shadows`修飾詞必須屬性，但只使用宣告的方法`new`（亦即只有 C# 方法） 將會有屬性設定為`true`.A method that is declared with either the `new` or the `Shadows` modifier will have the attribute, but only methods declared with `new` (that is, only C# methods) will have the property set to `true`. 若要判斷方法是否屬性，請使用類似下列的程式碼：`if ((myMethodInfo.Attributes & MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) == MethodAttributes.NewSlot)`在 C# 或`If (myMethodInfo.Attributes And MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) = MethodAttributes.NewSlot`在 Visual Basic 中。To determine whether a method has the attribute, use code similar to the following: `if ((myMethodInfo.Attributes & MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) == MethodAttributes.NewSlot)` in C# or `If (myMethodInfo.Attributes And MethodAttributes.VtableLayoutMask) = MethodAttributes.NewSlot` in Visual Basic. 不過請注意，，雖然所有的方法宣告與`new`或`Shadows`有屬性，並非所有的方法具有屬性宣告使用`new`或`Shadows`。Note, however, that although all methods declared with `new` or `Shadows` have the attribute, not all methods that have the attribute are declared with `new` or `Shadows`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含具有多載的方法，基底類別和衍生的類別會隱藏其中一個多載。The following code example contains a base class with an overloaded method, and a derived class that hides one of the overloads. 在 Visual Basic 版本的程式碼範例中，屬性會傳回`false`衍生類別中的成員。In the Visual Basic version of the code example, the property returns `false` for the member in the derived class. 在 C# 版本的程式碼範例中，該屬性傳回`true`衍生類別中的成員。In the C# version of the code sample, the property returns `true` for the member in the derived class. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/cpp/hide.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/CS/hide.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig/VB/hide.vb#1)]

public: virtual property bool IsSecurityCritical { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current method or constructor is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level, and therefore can perform critical operations.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current method or constructor is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level, and therefore can perform critical operations.

value.span: 如果目前的方法或建構函式是安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵在目前信任層級;是否透明。

span.span: if the current method or constructor is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level; if it is transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性報表的方法或建構函式在其目前信任層級，common language runtime (CLR) 所決定的透明度。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the method or constructor at its current trust level, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 這些屬性的組合是下表所示：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全性層級Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecuritySafeCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |CriticalCritical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全關鍵Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件和型別和成員的安全性註釋、 檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types and members, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. > [!IMPORTANT] > 對於部分信任組件，這個屬性的值會取決於目前的信任層級的組件中。For partial-trust assemblies, the value of this property depends on the current trust level of the assembly. 如果組件會載入至部分信任的應用程式網域 （例如，插入的沙箱化應用程式定義域），執行階段就會忽略組件的安全性註釋。If the assembly is loaded into a partially trusted application domain (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 組件和其所有類型都視為透明的。The assembly and all its types are treated as transparent. 執行階段以部分信任組件的安全性註釋只修改時小心，該組件會載入至完全信任的應用程式網域 （例如，插入的桌面應用程式的預設應用程式網域）。The runtime pays attention to the security annotations of a partial-trust assembly only when that assembly is loaded into a fully trusted application domain (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 相反地，受信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取中） 會一律載入以完全信任，不論應用程式定義域的信任層級因此其目前的信任層級永遠都是完全受信任。By contrast, a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is always loaded with full trust regardless of the trust level of the application domain, so its current trust level is always fully trusted. 您可以使用，以判斷目前的信任層級的組件和應用程式定義域和屬性。You can determine the current trust levels of assemblies and application domains by using the and properties. 如需有關反映和透明度的詳細資訊，請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。For more information about reflection and transparency, see [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). 透明度的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性報表的方法或建構函式在其目前信任層級，common language runtime (CLR) 所決定的透明度。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the method or constructor at its current trust level, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 這些屬性的組合是下表所示：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全性層級Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecuritySafeCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |CriticalCritical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全關鍵Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件和型別和成員的安全性註釋、 檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types and members, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. > [!IMPORTANT] > 對於部分信任組件，這個屬性的值會取決於目前的信任層級的組件中。For partial-trust assemblies, the value of this property depends on the current trust level of the assembly. 如果組件會載入至部分信任的應用程式網域 （例如，插入的沙箱化應用程式定義域），執行階段就會忽略組件的安全性註釋。If the assembly is loaded into a partially trusted application domain (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 組件和其所有類型都視為透明的。The assembly and all its types are treated as transparent. 執行階段以部分信任組件的安全性註釋只修改時小心，該組件會載入至完全信任的應用程式網域 （例如，插入的桌面應用程式的預設應用程式網域）。The runtime pays attention to the security annotations of a partial-trust assembly only when that assembly is loaded into a fully trusted application domain (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 相反地，受信任的組件 （也就是強式名稱組件安裝在全域組件快取中） 會一律載入以完全信任，不論應用程式定義域的信任層級因此其目前的信任層級永遠都是完全受信任。By contrast, a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is always loaded with full trust regardless of the trust level of the application domain, so its current trust level is always fully trusted. 您可以使用，以判斷目前的信任層級的組件和應用程式定義域和屬性。You can determine the current trust levels of assemblies and application domains by using the and properties. 如需有關反映和透明度的詳細資訊，請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。For more information about reflection and transparency, see [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). 透明度的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虛擬成員可能會參考類別中的執行個體資料，而且必須透過類別的執行個體參考。A virtual member may reference instance data in a class and must be referenced through an instance of the class. 若要判斷是否可覆寫方法，不檢查是否足夠`IsVirtual`是`true`。To determine if a method is overridable, it is not sufficient to check that `IsVirtual` is `true`. 將可覆寫，方法如`IsVirtual`必須`true`和必須`false`。For a method to be overridable, `IsVirtual` must be `true` and must be `false`. 例如，方法可能會非虛擬的但它會實作介面方法。For example, a method might be non-virtual, but it implements an interface method. Common language runtime 需要實作介面成員的所有方法都必須都標示為`virtual`; 因此，編譯器會將方法標示`virtual final`。The common language runtime requires that all methods that implement interface members must be marked as `virtual`; therefore, the compiler marks the method `virtual final`. 讓某些情況下，其中的方法標示為`virtual`但仍不可覆寫。So there are cases where a method is marked as `virtual` but is still not overridable. 若要確定是否可覆寫方法，使用如下的程式碼：To establish with certainty whether a method is overridable, use code such as this: ```csharp if (MethodInfo.IsVirtual && !MethodInfo.IsFinal) ``` ```vb If MethodInfo.IsVirtual AndAlso Not MethodInfo.IsFinal Then ``` 如果`IsVirtual`是`false`或`IsFinal`是`true`，則無法覆寫此方法。If `IsVirtual` is `false` or `IsFinal` is `true`, then the method cannot be overridden. 您可以判斷是否目前的方法覆寫基底類別中的方法藉由呼叫方法。You can determine whether the current method overrides a method in a base class by calling the method. 下列範例會實作`IsOverride`此方法。The following example implements an `IsOverride` method that does this. [!code-csharp[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/IsOverride1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/IsOverride1.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列範例會顯示`false`如`IsFinal`，這可能會導致您認為`MyMethod`是可覆寫。The following example displays `false` for `IsFinal`, which might lead you to think that `MyMethod` is overridable. 程式碼會列印`false`即使`MyMethod`未標記為`virtual`因此不能覆寫。The code prints `false` even though `MyMethod` is not marked `virtual` and thus cannot be overridden. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodBase.IsVirtual Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
